trans-unit.source: Serves as the abstract base class for data listing controls, such as <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 可做為抽象基底類別的資料清單控制項，例如<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref>和<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This class provides the methods and properties common to all data listing controls.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別提供的方法和屬性通用於所有清單控制項的資料。

trans-unit.source: The BaseDataList class provides the common functionality for all data listing controls, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: BaseDataList 類別提供所有資料清單控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>的一般功能

trans-unit.source: A data listing control is used to display the records from a data source, such as a <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName> control.
trans-unit.target: 資料清單控制項用來顯示資料來源的記錄，例如<xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>控制項。</xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Each data listing control can have a unique display style and capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 每個資料清單控制項可以有唯一的顯示樣式和功能。

trans-unit.source: Because the BaseDataList class is abstract, an instance of this class is not created directly.
trans-unit.target: BaseDataList 類別是抽象的因為這個類別的執行個體不會直接建立。

trans-unit.source: Instead, data listing controls inherit the methods and properties common to all data listing controls from this class.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，資料清單控制項繼承的方法和屬性通用於所有清單控制項，從這個類別的資料。

trans-unit.source: You can control the appearance of a data listing control by setting certain properties of this class.
trans-unit.target: 您可以控制資料，藉由設定這個類別的特定屬性清單控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: To determine the amount of spacing between the cells of a data listing control, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.CellSpacing%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷資料清單控制項的儲存格之間的間距數量，請設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.CellSpacing%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.CellSpacing%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the amount of spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.CellPadding%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷資料格的內容和儲存格的框線之間的間距數量，請設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.CellPadding%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.CellPadding%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can display the border between the individual cells of a data listing control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.GridLines%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以顯示的資料清單控制項，藉由設定個別儲存格之間的框線上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.GridLines%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.GridLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: The horizontal alignment of the content in the cells of a data listing control is controlled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.HorizontalAlign%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的資料清單控制項的資料格的內容的水平對齊由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.HorizontalAlign%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.HorizontalAlign%2A>

trans-unit.source: The BaseDataList class provides two properties to support data binding.
trans-unit.target: BaseDataList 類別提供兩個屬性，以支援資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: To bind data to any collection that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName> interface (such as <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>), or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property to specify the data source.
trans-unit.target: 若要將資料繫結至任何實作的集合<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>介面 (例如<xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>)，或<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>介面，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>屬性來指定資料來源。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property, you must manually write the code to perform the data binding.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>屬性，您必須手動撰寫的程式碼來執行資料繫結。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: To automatically bind a data listing control to a data source represented by a data source control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> property and set its value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the data source control to use.
trans-unit.target: 若要自動將資料繫結清單控制項至資料來源控制項所代表的資料來源，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>屬性並將其值設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>使用資料來源控制項的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> property, the data listing control automatically binds to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>屬性，自動清單控制項的資料繫結至指定的資料來源控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you do not need to explicitly call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您不需要明確地呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the data source specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property contains multiple sources of data, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> property to specify the specific source to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>屬性包含多個資料來源，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>屬性來指定要繫結至控制項的特定來源。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName> object with multiple tables, you must specify which table to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您有<xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>物件多個資料表，您必須指定要繫結至控制項的資料表。</xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: After you have specified the data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A> method to bind the data source to the control.
trans-unit.target: 您已指定資料來源之後，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>資料來源繫結至控制項的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: The BaseDataList class contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeys%2A> collection that stores the key field of each record (displayed as a row) in a data listing control.
trans-unit.target: BaseDataList 類別包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeys%2A>儲存資料清單控制項中的每一筆記錄 （顯示為一個資料列） 的索引鍵欄位集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeys%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to store the key field with a data listing control without displaying it in the control.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您儲存的索引鍵欄位的資料，而不會顯示在控制項中清單控制項。

trans-unit.source: The key field is commonly used as part of an update query string to revise a specific record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵欄位常用更新查詢字串的一部分來修改資料來源中的特定記錄。

trans-unit.source: The collection is filled with the values from the field specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 集合會填入從所指定的欄位值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The BaseDataList class provides a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.SelectedIndexChanged> event that is raised when the selected item in the control changes.
trans-unit.target: BaseDataList 類別提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.SelectedIndexChanged>控制項中選取的項目變更時引發的事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.SelectedIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs a specific set of instructions when the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您建立自訂事件處理常式在引發事件時執行一組特定的指示。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> object is not created directly.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>物件不會直接建立。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is commonly called in the constructor of a derived class to initialize the properties defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式通常稱為衍生的類別，來初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>中定義的屬性的建構函式中

trans-unit.source: Notifies the server control that an element, either XML or HTML, was parsed, and adds the element to the server control's <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 通知伺服器控制項，XML 或 HTML 項目已剖析，並將項目加入伺服器控制項的<xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref>集合。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the parsed element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>表示已剖析的項目。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to render in an HTML caption element in the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要轉譯的 HTML 標題項目在控制項中的文字。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性被提供用來將控制項設為使用者的輔助技術裝置更容易存取。

trans-unit.source: Use the Caption property to specify the text to render in an HTML caption element in the control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 [標題] 屬性來指定要呈現控制項中的 HTML 標題項目中的文字。

trans-unit.source: The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the control.
trans-unit.target: 您指定的文字會提供描述控制項的輔助技術裝置。

trans-unit.source: To specify the alignment of the HTML caption element in the control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.CaptionAlign%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定控制項的 HTML 標題項目對齊方式，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.CaptionAlign%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.CaptionAlign%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和當地語系化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the text to render in an HTML caption element in the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示要轉譯的 HTML 標題項目在控制項中文字的字串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項中的 HTML caption 元素的水平或垂直位置。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性被提供用來將控制項設為使用者的輔助技術裝置更容易存取。

trans-unit.source: Use the CaptionAlign property to specify the horizontal or vertical position of the HTML caption element in a control.
trans-unit.target: 指定水平或垂直位置的 HTML 標題項目在控制項中使用 CaptionAlign 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性被提供用來將控制項設為使用者的輔助技術裝置更容易存取。

trans-unit.source: This property is set using one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會設定使用其中一種<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign>列舉值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the possible values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可能的值。

trans-unit.source: |Value|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|The caption element's alignment is not set.| |`Top`|The caption element is aligned with the top of the table.| |`Bottom`|The caption element is aligned with the bottom of the table.| |`Left`|The caption element is aligned with the left edge of the table.| |`Right`|The caption element is aligned with the right edge of the table.| Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.Caption%2A> property to specify the text to render in an HTML caption element in a control.
trans-unit.target: |值 |描述 | |-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未設定標題項目對齊。 | |`Top`|標題項目會在資料表頂端對齊。 | |`Bottom`|標題項目對齊資料表底部。 | |`Left`|標題項目與資料表的左邊緣對齊。 | |`Right`|標題項目對齊右邊的資料表。 | 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.Caption%2A>屬性來指定要呈現控制項中的 HTML 標題項目中的文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.Caption%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign"></xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_NotSet" name="NotSet" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_NotSet" name="NotSet" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified type is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的型別不是其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign"></xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定儲存格的內容和儲存格的框線之間的空間數量。

trans-unit.source: Use the CellPadding property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 CellPadding 屬性來控制的儲存格的內容與儲存格的框線之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 指定的填補量會加入至儲存格的四個邊。

trans-unit.source: All cells in the same column of a data listing control share the same cell width.
trans-unit.target: 在相同的資料行的資料清單控制項中的所有資料格會共用同一個儲存格的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if the content of one cell is longer than the content of other cells in the same column, the padding amount is applied to the widest cell.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果一個資料格的內容長度超過在相同的資料行中的其他資料格的內容，填補數量的動作就會套用到最寬的資料格。

trans-unit.source: All other cells in the column are also set to this cell width.
trans-unit.target: 資料行中的所有資料格也都設為這個儲存格的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, all cells in the same row share the same height.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，相同的資料列中的所有資料格會共用相同的高度。

trans-unit.source: The padding amount is applied to the height of the tallest cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: 填補量會套用到資料列中最高的資料格的高度。

trans-unit.source: All other cells in the row are set to this cell height.
trans-unit.target: 資料列中的所有資料格會設定為這個儲存格的高度。

trans-unit.source: Individual cell sizes cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: 個別儲存格大小不能指定。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space (in pixels) between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 之間的空間量 （以像素為單位） 的資料格的內容和儲存格的框線。

trans-unit.source: The default value is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為-1，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between cells.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定儲存格之間的空間量。

trans-unit.source: Use the CellSpacing property to control the spacing between adjacent cells in a data listing control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 CellSpacing 屬性來控制資料清單控制項中的相鄰資料格之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 垂直和水平，則會套用這個間距。

trans-unit.source: The cell spacing is uniform for the entire data listing control.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格間距是一致的整個資料清單控制項。

trans-unit.source: Individual cell spacing between each row or column cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: 無法指定每個資料列或資料行之間的個別儲存格間距。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you set this property to a value greater than `0` and set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.GridLines%2A> property to a value that displays the cell borders, a gap is displayed between the borders of adjacent cells.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果您設定此屬性的值大於`0`並設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.GridLines%2A>屬性相鄰的資料格的框線之間顯示儲存格框線的值，顯示間隔。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.GridLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this situation, the CellSpacing property controls the size of the gap.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，CellSpacing 屬性控制的差距大小。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space (in pixels) between cells.
trans-unit.target: 儲存格之間的距離 （以像素為單位） 數量。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> object that contains a collection of child controls in a data listing control.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref>物件，其中包含資料清單控制項中的子控制項的集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the Controls collection to manage the child controls contained in a data listing control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用控制項集合來管理資料清單控制項中所包含的子控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can add controls, remove controls, or iterate through the server controls in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將控制項加入、 移除控制項，或逐一查看集合中的伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> that contains a collection of child controls in a data listing control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含資料清單控制項中的子控制項的集合。

trans-unit.source: Creates a child control using the view state.
trans-unit.target: 建立使用檢視狀態的子控制項。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates the control hierarchy for the data listing control with or without the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會建立資料清單控制項，不論所指定的資料來源的控制項階層架構。

trans-unit.source: The CreateControlHierarchy method is a helper method used by a derived class to create its control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: CreateControlHierarchy 方法是用來建立其控制項階層架構在衍生類別的 helper 方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use the control's data source; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要使用控制項的資料來源;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a default <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object used by the data-bound control if no arguments are specified.
trans-unit.target: 建立預設<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>控制項所使用的繫結的資料如果未指定參數的物件。

trans-unit.source: The CreateDataSourceSelectArguments method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.SelectArguments%2A> property to create its default <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object.
trans-unit.target: CreateDataSourceSelectArguments 方法是 helper 方法，供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.SelectArguments%2A>屬性以建立其預設<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.SelectArguments%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> initialized to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref>初始化為<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.Empty%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Binds the control and all its child controls to the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 將控制項和其所有子控制項繫結至指定的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataBind method to bind the data source specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property to the data listing control.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結方法使用所指定的資料來源繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>資料清單控制項的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: By binding the data source to a data listing control, the information in the data source is displayed in a data listing control.
trans-unit.target: 資料清單控制項繫結資料來源，資料來源中的資訊會顯示在清單控制項的資料。

trans-unit.source: The DataBind method is also commonly used to synchronize the data source and a data listing control after information in the data source is updated.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結方法也常用於同步處理資料來源和資料更新資料來源中的資訊之後，清單控制項。

trans-unit.source: This allows any changes in the data source to also be updated in a data listing control.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓資料清單控制項中也會更新資料來源中的任何變更。

trans-unit.source: If the data source for the data listing control is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> property, you do not need to call the DataBind method.
trans-unit.target: 如果所指定資料清單控制項的資料來源<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>屬性，您不需要呼叫 DataBind。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls this method automatically to bind the specified data source control to the data listing control.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會呼叫這個方法會自動將指定的資料來源控制項繫結清單控制項的資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key field in the data source specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定所指定的資料來源中的索引鍵欄位<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: Use the DataKeyField property to specify the key field in the data source indicated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DataKeyField 屬性指定資料來源中的索引鍵欄位由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The specified field is used to populate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeys%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 指定的欄位用來填入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeys%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeys%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to store the key field with a data listing control without displaying it in the control.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您儲存的索引鍵欄位的資料，而不會顯示在控制項中清單控制項。

trans-unit.source: The key field is commonly used in a handler for an event, such as `ItemCommand` or `DeleteCommand`, as part of an update query string to revise a specific record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵欄位通常用來處理常式中的事件，例如`ItemCommand`或`DeleteCommand`，若要修改資料來源中的特定記錄更新查詢字串的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The key field helps the update query string identify the appropriate record to modify.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵欄位可協助您識別要修改的適當記錄更新查詢字串。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The name of the key field in the data source specified by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>所指定的資料來源中的索引鍵欄位的名稱

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyCollection"></xref> object that stores the key values of each record in a data listing control.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyCollection"></xref>將每一筆記錄的機碼值儲存在資料清單控制項中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataKeys collection to access the key values of each record (displayed as a row) in a data listing control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 DataKeys 集合來存取每一筆記錄 （顯示為一個資料列） 資料清單控制項中的機碼值。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to store the key field with a data listing control without displaying it in the control.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您儲存的索引鍵欄位的資料，而不會顯示在控制項中清單控制項。

trans-unit.source: This collection is automatically filled with the values from the field specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個集合會自動填入所指定的欄位的值填入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key field is commonly used in a handler for an event, such as `ItemCommand` or `DeleteCommand`, as part of an update query string to revise a specific record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵欄位通常用來處理常式中的事件，例如`ItemCommand`或`DeleteCommand`，若要修改資料來源中的特定記錄更新查詢字串的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The key field helps the update query string identify the appropriate record to modify.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵欄位可協助您識別要修改的適當記錄更新查詢字串。

trans-unit.source: For more information on accessing data with ASP.NET, see [ASP.NET Data Access Content Map](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用 ASP.NET 存取資料的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 資料存取內容對應](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f9219396-a0fa-481f-894d-e3d9c67d64f2)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyCollection"></xref> that stores the key values of each record in a data listing control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyCollection"> </xref>其中存放資料清單控制項中的每一筆記錄的機碼值。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> object that contains the key values of each record in a data listing control.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref>物件，其中包含資料清單控制項中的每一筆記錄的機碼值。

trans-unit.source: The DataKeysArray property is used by a derived class to store the key values of each record in a data listing control.
trans-unit.target: DataKeysArray 屬性可由衍生類別來存放資料清單控制項中的每一筆記錄的機碼值。

trans-unit.source: This property is generally used to generate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyCollection> object contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常用來產生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyCollection>中所含物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeys%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeys%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyCollection>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> that contains the key values of each record in a data listing control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref> ，其中包含資料清單控制項中的每一筆記錄的機碼值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specific data member in a multimember data source to bind to a data listing control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定多個成員的資料來源繫結至資料清單控制項中的特定資料成員。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataMember property to specify a member from a multimember data source to bind to the list control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 DataMember 屬性來指定多個成員的資料來源的成員，才能繫結清單控制項。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a data source with more than one table specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property, use the DataMember property to specify which table to bind to a data listing control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您有多個資料表中指定的資料來源<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>屬性，指定要繫結至清單控制項資料的資料表使用 DataMember 屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A data member from a multimember data source.
trans-unit.target: 從多個成員的資料來源的資料成員。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the source containing a list of values used to populate the items within the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定包含一份用來填入控制項內的項目值的來源。

trans-unit.source: Use the DataSource property to specify the source of values to bind to a data listing control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 DataSource 屬性來指定繫結至清單控制項的資料值的來源。

trans-unit.source: A data source must be a collection that implements either the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName> interface (such as <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName>) or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface to bind to a control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源必須實作的集合<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>介面 (例如<xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>，或<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName>) 或<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>繫結至控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>衍生的介面</xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource></xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you set the DataSource property, you must manually write the code to perform data binding.
trans-unit.target: 當您設定 DataSource 屬性時，您必須手動撰寫的程式碼來執行資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: If the data source specified by the DataSource property contains multiple sources of data, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> property to specify the specific source to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源屬性所指定的資料來源包含多個資料來源，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>屬性來指定要繫結至控制項的特定來源。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName> object with multiple tables, you must specify which table to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您有<xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>物件多個資料表，您必須指定要繫結至控制項的資料表。</xref:System.Data.DataSet?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: After you have specified the data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A> method to bind the data source to the control.
trans-unit.target: 您已指定資料來源之後，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>資料來源繫結至控制項的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternately, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> property to automatically bind to a data source represented by a data source control.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>自動繫結到資料來源控制項所代表的資料來源的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> property, the data listing control automatically binds to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>屬性，自動清單控制項的資料繫結至指定的資料來源控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要撰寫程式碼，明確地呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: If values are specified for both the DataSource property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> property, ASP.NET is not able to resolve the data source and an <xref:System.Web.HttpException?displayProperty=fullName> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的資料來源屬性的值和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>屬性，ASP.NET 會不能夠解析資料來源和<xref:System.Web.HttpException?displayProperty=fullName>擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.Web.HttpException?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> or <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"></xref> that contains a collection of values used to supply data to this control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>或<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"> </xref> ，其中包含用來提供給此控制項的資料值的集合。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The data source cannot be resolved because a value is specified for both the DataSource property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID*> property.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源無法解析，因為這兩個資料來源屬性指定的值和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID*>

trans-unit.source: The data source is of an invalid type.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源是類型的無效。

trans-unit.source: The data source must be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or implement either the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> or the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源必須是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>或實作<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>或<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"></xref>介面。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*> property of the data source control that the data listing control should use to retrieve its data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*>清單控制項的資料應該用來擷取其資料來源之資料來源控制項的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*>

trans-unit.source: Use the DataSourceID property to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the data source control that the data listing control should use to retrieve its data source.
trans-unit.target: 使用 DataSourceID 屬性來存取<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>清單控制項的資料應該用來擷取其資料來源之資料來源控制項的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data source control referenced by the DataSourceID property can be any control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源控制項參考的屬性可以是實作任何控制項的 DataSourceID<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The data source control must exist either in the same naming container as the data listing control that references it, or in a parent control of the data listing control.
trans-unit.target: 在相同的命名容器做為資料清單控制項參考它，或父控制項的資料清單控制項中，必須存在資料來源控制項。

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for this property, the data listing control automatically binds to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定這個屬性的值時，清單控制項會自動將資料繫結至指定的資料來源控制項。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to write code that explicitly calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要撰寫程式碼，明確地呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternately, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property to specify the source of values to bind to a data listing control.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>屬性來指定要繫結至資料清單控制項的值來源。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data source must be a collection that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName> interface (such as <xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName>) or the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface to bind to a control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源必須是集合中實作<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>介面 (例如<xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>，或<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName>) 或<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>繫結至控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>衍生的介面</xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource></xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Data.DataView?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property, you must manually write the code to perform data binding.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>屬性，您必須手動撰寫的程式碼來執行資料繫結。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If values are specified for both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property and the DataSourceID property, ASP.NET is not able to resolve the data source and an <xref:System.Web.HttpException?displayProperty=fullName> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>屬性和 DataSourceID 屬性，ASP.NET 不能解析資料來源和<xref:System.Web.HttpException?displayProperty=fullName>擲回例外狀況。</xref:System.Web.HttpException?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The programmatic identifier assigned to the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 指派給資料來源控制項的程式設計識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The data source cannot be resolved because a value is specified for both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> property and the DataSourceID property.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源無法解析，因為兩個指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>屬性和 DataSourceID 屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the data listing control requires data binding and that a valid data source control is specified before calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind*> method.
trans-unit.target: 確認資料清單控制項需要資料繫結，將會在呼叫之前確定已指定有效的資料來源控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind*>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind*>

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> property, ASP.NET automatically binds the data listing control to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>屬性，ASP.NET 會自動將資料繫結清單的指定的資料來源控制項的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: When ASP.NET performs data binding for the control, it calls the EnsureDataBound method first to verify that the control has not already been bound to data and that a valid data source control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface is specified for its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 執行資料繫結控制項，它會呼叫第一次，並確定控制項具有未繫結資料，有效的資料來源控制項所實作的 EnsureDataBound 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>介面指定為其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The EnsureDataBound method then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: EnsureDataBound 方法接著呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>-implemented object that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>-實作物件，代表資料來源。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The GetData method is a helper method called by derived classes (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>) to retrieve the data source.
trans-unit.target: GetData 方法是由衍生類別呼叫的 helper 方法 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>) 擷取資料來源。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>-implemented object that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>-實作物件，代表資料來源。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the border between the cells of a data listing control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值，指定是否要顯示的資料清單控制項的儲存格之間的框線上。

trans-unit.source: Use the GridLines property to specify whether the border between the cells of a data listing control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用格線屬性，指定是否要顯示資料清單控制項的儲存格之間的框線上。

trans-unit.source: This property is set with one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性設為其中一個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines>列舉值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the possible values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可能的值。

trans-unit.source: |Value|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`None`|No cell border is displayed.| |`Horizontal`|Only the upper and lower borders of the cells in a data listing control are displayed.| |`Vertical`|Only the left and right borders of the cells in the data list control are displayed.| |`Both`|All borders of the cells in a data listing control are displayed.|
trans-unit.target: |值 |描述 | |-----------|-----------------| |`None`|顯示沒有資料格框線。 | |`Horizontal`|只有上限和下限的框線資料清單控制項中的資料格會顯示。 | |`Vertical`|只有左和右框線資料清單控制項中的資料格會顯示。 | |`Both`|顯示所有資料清單控制項中的資料格的框線。 |

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Both" name="Both" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Both" name="Both" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of a data listing control within its container.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料清單控制項容器中的控制項的水平對齊。

trans-unit.source: Use the HorizontalAlign property to specify the horizontal alignment of a data listing control within its container.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 HorizontalAlign 屬性來指定資料清單控制項容器中的控制項的水平對齊。

trans-unit.source: This property is set with one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性設為其中一個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign>列舉值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the possible values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可能的值。

trans-unit.source: |Value|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|The horizontal alignment is not set.| |`Left`|The data listing control is left-aligned within its container.| |`Center`|The data listing control is centered within its container.| |`Right`|The data listing control is right-aligned within its container.|
trans-unit.target: |值 |描述 | |-----------|-----------------| |`NotSet`|未設定水平對齊。 | |`Left`|清單控制項的資料是靠左對齊，其容器內。 | |`Center`|資料清單控制項置於其容器。 | |`Right`|清單控制項的資料是靠右對齊，其容器內。 |

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_NotSet" name="NotSet" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_NotSet" name="NotSet" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control has been initialized.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出控制項是否已初始化。

trans-unit.source: The Initialized property is used by derived classes (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>) to determine whether the control has been initialized.
trans-unit.target: 初始化屬性由衍生類別 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>) 來判斷是否已初始化控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control has been initialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項已初始化。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified data type can be bound to a list control that derives from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的資料類型是否可以繫結至清單控制項衍生自<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use the IsBindableType static method to determine whether the specified data type can be bound to a list control that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用 IsBindableType 靜態方法來判斷指定的資料類型是否可以繫結至清單控制項繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: The supported data types are <xref:System.Boolean?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Byte?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.SByte?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Int16?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.UInt16?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.UInt32?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Int64?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.UInt64?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Char?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Decimal?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: The supported data types are <xref:System.Boolean?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Byte?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.SByte?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Int16?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.UInt16?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.UInt32?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Int64?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.UInt64?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Char?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Decimal?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Decimal?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Double?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Char?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.UInt64?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Int64?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.UInt32?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Int32?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.UInt16?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Int16?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.SByte?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Byte?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Boolean?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the data type to test.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=fullName> ，其中包含要測試的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified data type can be bound to a list control that derives from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref> class; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的資料類型可以繫結至清單控制項衍生自<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref>類別; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID*> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID*>屬性設定。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID*>

trans-unit.source: The IsBoundUsingDataSourceID property is used by derived classes (such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>) to determine whether the data-bound control is bound to an ASP.NET version 2.0 data source control.
trans-unit.target: IsBoundUsingDataSourceID 屬性由衍生類別 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>) 來決定是否要將資料繫結控制項結合至 2.0 的資料來源控制項的 ASP.NET 版本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID*> is set to a value other than <xref:System.String.Empty>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID*>以外設定為值<xref:System.String.Empty>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID*>

trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding> event is raised when data is bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>繫結至資料時，就會引發事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBinding>

trans-unit.source: This method notifies the control to perform any data-binding logic that is associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會通知控制項執行與它相關聯的任何資料繫結邏輯。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: The OnDataBinding method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnDataBinding 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Called when one of the base data source identification properties is changed, to rebind the data-bound control to its data.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫其中一個基底的資料來源識別屬性變更時，重新繫結至其資料的資料繫結控制項。

trans-unit.source: The OnDataPropertyChanged method is called to rebind the data-bound control to its data when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> property changes values after the page's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event.
trans-unit.target: OnDataPropertyChanged 呼叫重新繫結至其資料的資料繫結控制項時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>屬性的值變更後在頁面的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.target: 您嘗試變更控制項的資料繫結階段屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceViewChanged method notifies a data-bound control that the underlying data source has changed and that the control should rebind and any necessary work should be performed.
trans-unit.target: OnDataSourceViewChanged 方法會通知已變更基礎資料來源的資料繫結控制項和控制項應重新繫結，以及應該執行任何所需的工作。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the OnDataSourceViewChanged method is called when a property of the data source view has changed.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，當資料來源檢視的屬性已經變更時，會呼叫 OnDataSourceViewChanged 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `true` when the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>類別集<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.RequiresDataBinding%2A>屬性`true`時<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged>就會引發事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.DataSourceViewChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.RequiresDataBinding%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Load"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Load"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.SelectedIndexChanged"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.SelectedIndexChanged"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.SelectedIndexChanged> event is raised when a different item is selected in a data listing control between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.SelectedIndexChanged>資料清單控制項之間張貼至伺服器 中選取不同的項目時，就會引發事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.SelectedIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: The OnSelectedIndexChanged method allows you to create a custom handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: OnSelectedIndexChanged 方法可讓您建立自訂事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: The OnSelectedIndexChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnSelectedIndexChanged 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Sets up the control hierarchy for the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 設定資料繫結控制項的控制項階層架構。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>, you must implement the PrepareControlHierarchy method to prepare the control hierarchy for the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 當您繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>，您必須實作 PrepareControlHierarchy 方法，以準備資料繫結控制項的控制項階層架構。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: Renders the control to the specified HTML writer.
trans-unit.target: 將控制項呈現在指定的 HTML 寫入器。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that contains the output stream to render on the client.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> ，其中包含要在用戶端上呈現的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the data listing control needs to bind to its specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否需要繫結至其指定的資料來源清單控制項的資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> control uses the RequiresDataBinding property to determine whether the control needs to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A> method to bind to its specified data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>控制項使用 RequiresDataBinding 屬性以判斷控制項是否需要呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>繫結至其指定的資料來源的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: Each time the `set` accessor is called on either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> property to change the data source after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.OnInit%2A> method has already been called, ASP.NET automatically sets the value of the RequiresDataBinding property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 每次`set`上呼叫存取子<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>、 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>屬性來變更資料來源之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.OnInit%2A>呼叫方法，ASP.NET 會自動設定的 RequiresDataBinding 屬性值`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.OnInit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the RequiresDataBinding property is also set to `true` when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: RequiresDataBinding 屬性的值也會設為`true`時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>方法呼叫。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET automatically sets the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.RequiresDataBinding%2A> property to `false` immediately after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A> method has been called.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會自動設定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.RequiresDataBinding%2A>屬性`false`之後立即<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>呼叫方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Repeater.RequiresDataBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control needs to bind to a data source; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項需要繫結至資料來源;，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object that the data-bound control uses when retrieving data from a data source control.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref>物件從資料來源控制項擷取資料時，會使用資料繫結控制項。

trans-unit.source: The SelectArguments property calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A> method to create a default <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object.
trans-unit.target: SelectArguments 屬性呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A>方法來建立預設<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> used by the data-bound control to retrieve data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref>資料繫結控制項用於擷取資料。

trans-unit.source: The default is to return the value from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments*>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.CreateDataSourceSelectArguments*>傳回值

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a different item is selected in a data listing control between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: 資料清單控制項之間張貼至伺服器 中選取不同的項目時，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: The SelectedIndexChanged event is raised when a different item is selected in a data listing control between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: 資料清單控制項之間張貼至伺服器 中選取不同的項目時，會引發 SelectedIndexChanged 事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the <xref uid="langword_csharp_disabled" name="disabled" href=""></xref> attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出控制項是否應該設定<xref uid="langword_csharp_disabled" name="disabled" href=""></xref>屬性來呈現之 HTML 項目的"disabled"當控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會指出如何 ASP.NET 應該呈現 HTML 控制項的停用控制項時。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性是`true`，ASP.NET 會呈現`disabled`屬性停用控制項時。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性是`false`，ASP.NET 會呈現`class`屬性停用控制項時。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than `4.0`; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性表示的 ASP.NET 版本低於`4.0`，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the data listing control renders its header in an accessible format.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出資料清單控制項是否呈現其標頭中存取的格式。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性被提供用來將控制項設為使用者的輔助技術裝置更容易存取。

trans-unit.source: Use the UseAccessibleHeader property to specify whether the data listing control renders its header in an accessible format.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 UseAccessibleHeader 屬性來指定資料清單控制項是否呈現其標頭中存取的格式。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to make the control more accessible to users of assistive technology devices.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性被提供用來將控制項設為使用者的輔助技術裝置更容易存取。

trans-unit.source: By default, the value of this property is `false` and the header for the control is rendered between cell tags `` and ``.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個屬性的值是`false`控制項頁首會轉譯資料格標籤之間和``和``。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is `true`, the header for the control is rendered between table header cell tags `<th>` and `</th>`.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性的值為`true`，控制項頁首會轉譯表格標頭資料格標籤之間`<th>`和`</th>`。

trans-unit.source: In addition, a `scope="col"` attribute is added to the table header to specify that the header applies to all the cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: 此外，`scope="col"`屬性加入至資料表標頭，指定資料行中的所有資料格套用標頭。

trans-unit.source: The default rendering of the `<th>` element is preserved, rendering text as bold and centered horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 預設呈現`<th>`保留項目，以水平方式轉譯為粗體和置中的文字。

trans-unit.source: Developers can override the behavior of the `<th>` element using a cascading style sheet (CSS).
trans-unit.target: 開發人員可以覆寫行為`<th>`項目使用階層式樣式表 (CSS)。

trans-unit.source: However, requiring the use of style sheets is discouraged when creating accessible Web pages.
trans-unit.target: 不過，建立可存取的網頁時，建議不要使用樣式表。

trans-unit.source: For data listing controls, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, that inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class, you can set the UseAccessibleHeader property declaratively or programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 資料清單控制項，例如針對<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控制項和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>類別，您可以設定 UseAccessibleHeader 屬性，以宣告方式或以程式設計的方式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: If you set the UseAccessibleHeader property programmatically, set it before binding data with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您以程式設計方式設定 UseAccessibleHeader 屬性之前, 進行設定與資料繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control renders its header in an accessible format; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項呈現可存取的格式，其標頭否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
